xml.data:
Home » 39P3 Dhammānuloma (1), Dukatikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (3) » 2 Hetugocchaka, Kusalattika » 2.2 Sahetukaduka, Kusalattika » 2.2.2 Akusalapada » 2.2.2.7 Pañhāvāra
Paccanīyuddhāra
Hetugocchaka, Kusalattika
Sahetukaduka, Kusalattika
Akusalapada
Pañhāvāra
Paccanīyuddhāra
15.
1279Sahetuko akusalo dhammo sahetukassa akusalassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo…  sahajātapaccayena paccayo…  upanissayapaccayena paccayo. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
16.
1280Nahetuyā nava, naārammaṇe nava. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
1281Hetupaccayā naārammaṇe dve. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
1282Nahetupaccayā ārammaṇe nava. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
1283(Yathā kusalattike pañhāvārassa anulomampi paccanīyampi anulomapaccanīyampi paccanīyānulomampi gaṇitaṃ, evaṃ gaṇetabbaṃ.)
<< Hetu-ārammaṇādiup2.2.3 Abyākatapada >>
